69. $y=\cfrac{2x^2-8x}{|x-2|-2}=\begin{cases}\cfrac{2x(x-4)}{x-4}=2x,\ x\geqslant2,\ x\neq4,\\ \cfrac{2x(x-4)}{-x}=8-2x,\ x<2,\ x\neq0.\end{cases}$
$$% TIKZ_ID{task069-solution-fig1}
